gw.layers
Class LayerFactory

java.lang.Object
  gw.layers.LayerFactory

public class LayerFactory
extends java.lang.Object

Factory for SimpleFeature and GridCoverage layer creation from different sources.

Author:
Olaf David, Ian Overgard
